reviews.review_msg: Absolutely the best prof I have had and the best course I have taken during my undergraduate degree. He is a superb lecturer who does not just stand and talk but does his best to engage everyone. And I meant it when I say 'his best'. He will ask a question and wait forever until at least someone tries to give an answer. Be ready to participate.

Easily the most knowledgeable prof I've had; if you have any question about the material, he will know the answer. Teaching style: will ask questions and literally wait for an answer, so be ready to be active in class. Prepare a lot of time to do your readings, although they are very relevant and interesting. Expects a lot but will help you succeed
